title: General Warehouse Worker
description:
Steve Madden brand represents a lifestyle. It is about embracing fashion while still maintaining that funky independence that first defined the brand 20 years ago. With his product offering now including other accessories such as watches, jewelry, handbags, belts, sunwear, cold weather, outerwear and hosiery, Steve Madden is always looking towards the future. Join us today!

The energy of Steve Madden as a brand is represented, first and foremost, by our employees. We seek high-spirited, motivated and energized employees who are results driven.

As a result of growth, we are currently looking for Warehouse Clerks.

The Warehouse Clerk is responsible for counting, putting away, replenishing, and rotating stock in the warehouse on a daily basis.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Count and sort merchandise by location and product, number and description
  • Store merchandise on shelves, according to identifying information such as style, size, color, or type of material
  • Maintain set amounts in bulk and primary locations based on shelf capacity and pick velocity
  • Move and transport material of supplies
  • Unload container, labeling, product picking and other duties as required

Secondary Functions:

  • Special Projects as needed
  • Other duties as required

Specific Job Skills:

The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

  • Under general supervision, solves problems for self. Complex problems are referred to supervisor
  • Ability to understand and follow basic verbal instructions
  • ability to perform basic math computations
  • Able to grasp new concepts quickly and efficiently
  • operates somewhat complex equipment, often requiring education/training, including computer, pallet, jack/forklift
  • Job duties are repetitive and recurring and focus on a single task, seldom requiring attention to other areas/duties

Education, Licenses, Certificates, Registrations and/or Experience:

  • High School Diploma or GED
  • Forklift license an asset
  • Good physical shape to be able to stand, lifting boxes and moving skids

Language Skills:

  • French and English

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: From $17.00 per hour

Benefits:

  • Dental care
  • Extended health care
  • Paid time off
  • RRSP match
  • Store discount

Schedule:

  • 8 hour shift
  • Monday to Friday

Ability to commute/relocate:

  • Saint-Laurent, QC H4R 2N8: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (preferred)

Experience:

  • warehouse: 1 year (preferred)
